ComicInfo.Summary: The Avengers, led by Sue Richards, besiege the Baxter Building in an attempt to confront Mr. Fantastic about his manipulation of the timestream, not knowing that he is trying to save his wife's life in the future.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:35:38. [Issue ID 796906]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Strange,Captain America,Doctor Doom (cameo flashback),Thor,Invisible Woman,Nighthawk,Storm,Reed Richards,Wolverine] (cameo flashback),Jean Grey,Defenders [Hellcat,Galactus (cameo flashback),Vision,Molecule Man (cameo flashback),X-Men [Professor X,Nova],Iron Man,Valkyrie,Psycho-Man (cameo flashback),Hulk] (cameo flashback),Avengers [Black Widow,Cyclops,Sub-Mariner [Prince Namor]
